title: Anacostia Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Anacostia Park '70s-Themed Roller Skating Party!      Time: 3:00 PM to 8:30 PM Location: Anacostia Park Skating Pavilion, 1500 Anacostia Drive SE, Washington, DC, 20020 Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Celebrate the 100th birthday of the National Park Service by partying at the only roller skating pavilion in the entire National Park system!
